price: Anaasε moho atͻ mo sε, Nea Ɔwͻ soro no mma asaaase no mmene mo sε εwoso a?
arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: a-amintum man fī al-samāi an yakhsifa bikumu al-arḍa fa-idhā hiya tamūru
